name: Alone With The Dark
description:
Alone With The Dark

Using your mining ships, navigate the emptiness of space and harvest asteroids for materials.

Watch out for pirates. Press ESCAPE for the controls overview!!!

Game is made using Unreal Engine. If you require the pre-reqs it is under:
ExtractLocation\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us\UE5PrereqSetup_x64.exe
